title: Comment
content: I was deeply touched by two articles in the April 2012 issue: Elder David A. Bednar’s article,
“The Atonement and the Journey of Mortality”

(page 10). My questions about the true function of grace in our mortal lives and in our pursuit for eternal life were answered perfectly. I am grateful for these articles—they have increased my understanding so much, and I ponder them again and again.
